tags.name: intro
tags.content: Welcome to ChunkyDB — a visual, tag-based memory database. This project enables symbolic cube mapping and cross-tagging between files.

tags.name: understandingcubes
tags.content: There are three cubes — #x.projects.chunkydb.cubesbrief#t.maincube,nodecube,contextcube# — that organize your symbolic data.

tags.name: previewmodes
tags.content: To understand how your data is visualized, read about #x.projects.chunkydb.previewsbrief#t.textview,tagview,satelliteview#.
